sentences.en: A complete study of the propagation of shock waves in elastic solids is presently lacking.
sentences.cn: 关于弹性固体中冲击波的传播,目前还缺少全面的研究.

sentences.en: Also, the idea of progress and its enthusiastic propagation may have some effect.
sentences.cn: 还有, 进步观念及其热烈宣传也会产生某种效果.

sentences.en: Clonal propagation can also give some large gains in a relatively short time.
sentences.cn: 繁殖无性系也可以在较短期间内提供较大的增益.
裂纹的增长常常是开始缓慢.

sentences.en: Diseases spread by insects are encouraged when climatic conditions propagation of the vector.
sentences.cn: 当气候条件适于媒介昆虫繁殖时,由昆虫传播的疾病即行蔓延.

sentences.en: Efficient methods of vegetative propagation and improved screening techniques are also required.
sentences.cn: 高效率的无性繁殖法和改良的鉴定技术也属必需.

sentences.en: If a plant has spotted or crinkled leaves, do not use it for propagation.
sentences.cn: 如果植物的叶子有斑点或者萎缩，就不要用来繁殖。

sentences.en: It is the reverse of the propagation step in addition polymerization.
sentences.cn: 这一过程是加聚反应历程中链增长步序的逆过程.

sentences.en: Propagation of virus in embryonating eggs was first used by Goodpasture and Woodruff in 1931.
sentences.cn: 1931年Goodpasture和Woodruff首次应用鸡胚培养病毒.

sentences.en: Rose propagation has a long and rich history.
sentences.cn: 玫瑰繁殖有着悠久的历史。

sentences.en: So far we have described the propagation of alternating magnetic fields.
sentences.cn: 至此我们讨论了交变磁场的传播.

sentences.en: Such rootstocks or cultivars were reproduced true to type by vegetative propagation.
sentences.cn: 这些钻木和品种,通过无性繁殖长成和亲本一样的类型.

sentences.en: The method is a direct simulation of the actual process of radiation propagation.
sentences.cn: 这种方法是辐射传输实际过程的直接模拟.

sentences.en: The simplest explanation of aberration is the analogy of light propagation to the fall of raindrops.
sentences.cn: 对光行差的最简单的解释,是把光的传播同雨点的下落作类比.

sentences.en: We first take up the subject of optic ray propagation through a variety of optical media.
sentences.cn: 首先研究光束通过各种光学介质的传播问题.

phrases.tran_cn: 声传播；音响传输；声音传播
营养繁殖；植物无性繁殖

trans.tran_cn: 传播，传输，蔓延，扩展，波及深度，〔生〕繁殖法，〔地〕传导，宣传，培养
